name: Steamcraft2
tagline: SC2 is a UE add-on mod that adds Steampunk-themed power generation, blocks, items, and so much more.
body:
Steamcraft 2 - MC v1.6.4 ======================== A mod that extends Minecraft by adding post-apocalyptic, retro-futuristic blocks/items.
You are welcome to contribute to this mod, however, you will need to discuss things with me beforehand. Additionally, you will need to use the proper java code conventions in order to contribute.
These conventions can be located here: My Skype: johnny.eatmon
My Email:
Universal Electricity or Buildcraft Merge? ========================================== I was wondering...what if I were to merge this mod with a power system such as UE? I really wanted to create my own power system, but I realized it would be an enormous hassle and would possibly conflict with other mods (which is NOT acceptable). So, in order to make things simpler, I am considering using either UE's power system or Buildcraft's. Your feedback is appreciated:
Credits: - Proloe: for creating the first Steamcraft - moldywings: for his Minecraft mod models - ALinkToTheFuture: for use of his sprites - Papertazer: for coding support
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
